post.content:
Hello Mr Lee Han-Young;

Thanks for your inquiry again.

It is very unfortunate that I can not provide you with all answers

at this moment since my knowledge of the job prospect in your

specialized area is very limited.

Regarding the communication skill, there is not any standardized

measurement.

I think you are communicating with me OK in writing.

As long as you can speak/write in English and consequently understand

each other in any work environment, I assume that is all you need.

In conclusion, it is very difficult to give you any absolute answers

and not to give you any misleading information, I would like to

suggest you to try to contact all job agencies (Web sites) provided

on our home page. It will have some contact information as well.

Also please send a resume along with your questions to 'james@w5.net'

who is a Korean Agent.

I hope you find the information soon.

Please let me know if you have any other questions.

Thanks.

SK
